TopicTitle: Gaining Infinite Velocity with no engines/Cheats!

Articles.Content:
So yeah, just a few warnings before you watch this.

- I'm new-ish to Commentary, Please excuse the Terrible quality of my Commentary.

- I haven't got a link to the file as of yet. I shall get one soon.

- See if you can count how many times I use the term "As you can see".

- The quality isn't the best, this is cause my internet is very slow. and it takes hours to upload videos like this.

- My friend was the creator of this Glider.

- Make sure you have your volume DOWN before you watch this, The volume was quite loud when I recorded.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mmuT_UkOAkI

I know, I'm terrible at commentary... I try my best though.
